meanings.definition: Of or relating to true bugs.
meanings.sent1: The hemipterous insects have piercing mouthparts for sucking sap.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the hemipterous characteristics of the bug.
meanings.sent3: The hemipterous bugs were so tiny, they looked like moving dots.
meanings.sent4: Her fascination with hemipterous creatures was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The hemipterous wings shimmered in the sunlight, like delicate stained glass.

meanings.definition: A true bug, especially one of the order Hemiptera.
meanings.sent1: The hemipterous crawled slowly along the leaf, searching for food.
meanings.sent2: I found a hemipterous in the garden and marveled at its unique shape.
meanings.sent3: The hemipterous seemed to be playing hide-and-seek with the other insects.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the hemipterous was a tiny warrior in a world of giants.
meanings.sent5: The hemipterous stood out among the insects with its distinctive markings.
